meta.job_title: Brand and B2B Specialized Freelance Writer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft compelling narratives for feature launches, website content, newsletters, and sales enablement materials in US EN.
Develop captivating content that effectively communicates the value and uniqueness of the brand.
Creating content for landing pages, emails, crafting engaging newsletters, and creating persuasive sales enablement materials such as pitch decks and survey reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
